string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now...
{0} has started a game! use /join to enter Fairview, and look at those Tommy guns.
A new game has been started by {0}! Use /join to join the action, Mafia-style!
{0} has started a chaos game! use /join to enter Fairview, and look at those Tommy guns.
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Use /join to join the action, Mafia-style!
You can't join now! The game is already running. Use /nextgame to join be notified of the next game.
Nobody likes a latecomer, buster! The game's going, and you'll have to wait for the /nextgame!
You've already joined!
You've already got a flat in Fairview, stay calm and wait for the hunt.
Why the rush, soldier? You've been accepted as Fairview citizen! Just relax...
One minute left before the action begins. You can get your complimentary Fedora if you /join now.
{0} seconds left before the hunt begins. You can get your complimentary Fedora if you /join now.
You think we can conduct deals with so few people? Fairview is closed for now!
Why do we only have so few people? Closing Fairview's Mafia Business...
Game is starting, please wait while I assign roles and update the database.
Fairview is a city controlled by Mafia, and we'd like to keep it that way. Famiglia, you have a duty to protect the Godfather! Check for my messages in the mailbox for further instructions.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, don't annoy the Godfather and please change your name if you want to join.
Sorry, max player limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} click this: {1}, then click start. Until you do, you won't be able to play.
You can't run away! You're already out of town! Where do you want to go anyway?
Congratulation: you are not in Fairview anymore! Now stay calm, and nobody else is going to get hurt.
{0} has fled in terror! Seems like they can't handle the exciting life of a part of the Family.
{0} has fled in terror! The Famiglia doesn't need any scaredy-cat, anyway.
{0} players remain.
Take a breath! I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
You don't seem to live in Fairview...
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to do something to {1}
{0} has voted to exile {1}
{0} has not voted 2 nights in a row. The Fed's storm {0}'s house, finding them vanished myteriously. {1}
Your friends in the force has already been dead or missing. Now's your turn to carry the torch and save this city from Mafias!
Choice accepted
\nYour "personal advisor" is {0}.
{0} is arrested! You decided to take up their mantle. After all, you've watched them extracting information over and over again. You know you can do it.
{0} the Tech Assistant takes intiative to serve you in {1}'s disappearance. You're happy, and promote them into your new "personal advisor"!
After a long session, you've learnt that {0} is {1}! Well, they won't miss a relative or two, right?
Who do you want to exile from the town?
Whose information do you want to know? Discreetly, of course.
Who do you think will make a scoop so big they'll leave the city? Your newspaper has {0} more opening.
Who do you want to deliver the contraband to?
Whose relative do you want to "extract information" from?
Who do you want to make safer tonight?
Who do you want to arrest?
Who do you think are involved in the Church of Happyology?
Who is your parent?
Who do you want to convert to the Church of Happyology?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are a Repentant Mafia (Cursed) üòæ. You've been afraid with your criminal life's consequences, and ready to leave them for good whenever the cops come for you.
You are the Stalker (Detective) üïµ. During the day, you may stalk a player to reveal their true allegiance. But there is a 40% chance the cops will find you stalking around them!
You are a Corrupt Politician (Drunk) üçª! However corrupt you are, the town will honor you a night of mourning for your or your family's death.

You are the Bouncer (Guardian Angel) üëº. Every night, you can guard a citizen's house. Between your imposing build and a truck full of knives, pistols, machine guns, and every other weapon conceivable (yes, that include a knife-shooting machine gun... long story), the police won't risk a firefight and will abandon the raid if you happened to be guarding their target. But if you choose to guard a cop's house, there's a 50% chance you'll be arrested.
You are the Paparazzi (Gunner) üî´! You can't resist a big scoop. However, your headliner newspiece can force anybody to leave the city in shame.

You are the Middleman (Harlot) üíã! Your only job is to deliver these contrabands. Be careful for the cops, if they spotted you in front of their houses or the house they raid on, you'll be arrested too. They won't find you in your house though.
You are the Double Agent (Traitor) üñï. You lay low to hide your true allegiance, but if your cop friends are dead or missing, you'll be sure finish the job!
You are a Police Officer (Werewolf) üê∫. You vow to get rid of mafia in your beloved neighborhood, one scum at a time. Each night you can choose to arrest someone.
You are the Torture Technician (Seer) üë≥. Your job is to "extract information" about a citizen's true allegiance, without them knowing, of course.
You are a Mafia Soldier (Villager) üë±! Do your best protecting the Godfather from the cops!
You are the Suicide Bomber (Tanner) üë∫. When the city gives up on you, you'll also give up on the city, and detonate the bomb you planted everywhere.
You are the Idealist (Wild Child) üë∂. You never lose hope on human nature, even if your parent dies. In fact, if that happens, you'll join the police force and eradicate evil!
You are the Consigliere (Beholder) üëÅ, Godfather's right hand man. You employ a "personal advisor" to "extract information". That's the Torture Technician!
You are the Tech Assistant (Apprentice Seer) üôá. You never "extract information" by yourself, but if the Technician is nowhere to be found, you will be hired to do their job as well!
Welcome to the Church of Happyology (Cultist) üë§! You only wants everyone, mafia or not, chill and worship your deity. Now go convert those poor sad people out there!
You are the IRS Officer (Cult Hunter) üíÇ. You're informed that the Church of Happyology are embezzling tax from the City. Go arrest those creepy religious member!
It's starting to get dark. As the citizen gathers, they pick one person to exile from the city... \nEveryone now has {0} seconds to vote!
Come one, come all! We will participate in the public trial in Fairview's town hall to decide who's to be executed to death... by exile! \nEveryone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. The city is given {0} seconds to discuss between themselves.
Morning has come. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations / defenses / talk.
Night has fallen. Everyone head to bed, weary after another stressful day. Night players: you have {0} seconds use your actions!
It's already dark. Ignoring the usual cat screams and clanging in the alley, everybody goes to their homes. Night players: you have {0} seconds use your actions!
The citizens have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is exiled. {1}
The town has chosen! {0} is sentenced to death... by exile! {1}
"Why can't we unite?", murmurs one guy. The city's split on who's to be exiled, and as the result, no one is exiled.
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No exile tonight.....
The Newspaper just come in! {0} is caught arrested by the police. Their Stalker üïµ days are over.
The Newspaper just come in! {0} confessed to be a Stalker üïµ, brought immediately to the Police Station!
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that {0} the Bouncer-for-Hire üëº is arrested on jaywalking charges. They're behind bars now.
The Newspaper just come in! {0} was caught for parking their truck in the disabled space! The police confiscates the arsenal of Bouncer üëº in the truck!
The Newspaper just come in! Their staff, {0} üî´, is arrested for peeping on the cops locker room. What are they looking for there?
The Newspaper just come in! A Public Apology, saying that whatever {0} is caught for, they don't have anything to do with the Paparazzi üî´!
The Newspaper just come in! {0} is arrested for assault and kidnapping charge. They can't "extract information" anymore. The Torture Technician üë≥ is arrested.
The Newspaper just come in! Police found several torture paraphernalia and, curiously, a blackboard saying "2 + 2 = 5" in {0}'s house! The Torture Technician üë≥ is arrested.
The Newspaper just come in! The spouse of {0} the Corrupt Politician üçª was found dead in their house. Tonight, every member of the cops will guard at their funeral.
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that {0} was caught for libel, slander, and generally every lie ever made. They can't Gossip about someone's true allegiance anymore.
The Newspaper just come in! They reported that {0} was arrested by the police for being in Mafia business! {1}
The Newspaper just come in! Police Raid at {0}'s house, owner was arrested! {1}
The Newspaper just come in! {0} was arrested last night on allegations of arson, murder, vandalism, and jaywalking! {1}
The Newspaper just come in! A member of the Church of Happyology üë§, {0}, was arrested by federal officers. It seems they are embezzling money from the City.
The Newspaper just come in! {0} was arrested by the FBI! They say an informant from IRS notified them of "too much happiness in one room". Was it a code?
All was calm the previous night, no sound of police raid or anything whatsoever.
The cops came and tried to arrest you, but you offer them your cooperation for taking down the mafia! You are their comrades now.
Your comrades are now: {0}
It seems that the Repentant Mafia joins you as a comrade: {0}!
BANG! BANG! BANG! OPEN UP! THIS IS A POLICE RAID!
You were just about to lie down to sleep when cops force their way into your home, shouting: "FREEZE, FAIRVIEW PD! YOU ARE NOW UNDER ARREST!"
Uh oh, a cop shot {0}'s spouse in the raid! There will be a funeral tomorrow night, you won't be able to do raids.
What are you doing, hanging about a cop's house? You are arrested!
You have saved {0} from the cops. Guess that truck full of guns help, huh?
After a long, eventless night standing guard in front of {0}'s house from your arsenal truck, you head home and try to catch a quick nap.
{0} wasn't home!
The Bouncer decided to drop by your home last night, and scared the cops from raiding your house.
The Newspaper just come in! Headline: {0} stays home with truckload of illegal guns and counterfeit money! They are the Middleman üíã.
{0} wasn't home!
{0} was a cop! What were you thinking, going to a police's house with illegal firearms and fake money?
The Newspaper just come in! {0} visited a police officer's house with counterfeit money, arrested immediately! They said they're only a Middleman üíã!
The Newspaper just come in! {0} visited a police officer's house with illegal firearms, arrested immediately! They confess to be a Middleman üíã for the Godfather!
The Newspaper just come in! {0} visited {1}'s house to complete a transaction. However, the cops were raiding their house. {0} the Middleman üíã is arrested for illegal firearms possession.
The transaction with {0} was a success! You went back with a lighter truck and a heavier wallet.
The Middleman comes with your goods. You pay them a hefty sum and quickly sends them on their way.
You caught {0} snooping about! They are the Stalker (Detective).
Like a true Stalker, you now know that {0} is {1}!
It seems that {0} the Paparazzi got the short end of a deal. He wrote an expose on {1} and got revenge. {1} the Middleman üíã was swiftly arrested.
The Newspaper just come in! HEADLINE: COMPROMISING PHOTOS OF {1}! Writer: {0}. They seem to be very embarassed and take the first bus out of Fairview! {2}
The Newspaper just come in! HEADLINE: IS {1} REALLY THE KINGPIN OF CRIME? Writer: {0}. Even if it's not true, their reputation is done for. They take leave Fairview hastily! {2}
The police has won! Fairview is free from corrupt mafias!
The Mafias are all caught, and with them, the Godfather! Fairview can boast a mafia-free neighborhood now!
The polices have won! Fairview is free from corrupt mafias!
The Mafias are all caught, and with them, the Godfather! Fairview can boast a mafia-free neighborhood now!
The mafias have won! With no pesky do-gooder cop, it's mafia stronghold here.
The Fairview's Finest is now the Fairview's Crook, the Godfather control all Fairview!
Oh no! You choose to exile the Suicide Bomber! "It's not about me, it's about sending a message." They detonate themself and several bombs in the city!
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1} to the Church of Happyology.
{0} was sent to {1}'s house to convert and offer them "tax evasion" plan. However, they were IRS Agent! {0} was arrested for tax embezzlement.
{0} was arrested for trying to offer you a "tax evasion" plan. Your informant says that {1} church member remain.
Welcome to the Church of Happyology! Forget about the Mafia, this church will help you. Every night, you have the opportunity to offer the same fellowship to other players.
Fellow member of the Church: {0}
You welcome {0} to the Church!
{0} went to {1}'s house, but they weren't home!
All the cops are gone, and Fairview is now a haven for the Church of Happyology!
You try to arrest {0}, but they are already jailed!
You go to {0} in the middle of the night, just to find their Church of Happyology membership card. You arrest them immediately.
You go to {0} in the middle of the night, and after several rough questions, you believe that they aren't involved with the Church of Happyology. You leave immediately.
{0}'s parents just disappeares! For their bravery, they are employed by the police temporarily.
{0} has disappeared. Determined to get revenge, you persuade the police chief into employing you. Your new teammates are: {1}
a Mafia Soldier üë±
the Politician üçª
the Middleman üíã
the Torture Technician üë≥
the Double Agent üñï
the Bouncer üëº
the Stalker üïµ
a Police Officer üê∫
the Repentant Mafia üòæ
the Paparazzi üî´
the Suicide Bomber üë∫
the Gossip üÉè
the Idealist üë∂
the Consigliere üëÅ
the Tech Assistant üôá
a Happyology Member üë§
the IRS Agent üíÇ
Ran Away
üíÄ Out of Town
üôÇ In Town
Fairview. Population:
a Caporegime üë∑
You are a Caporegime (Mason) üë∑, a Mafia Captain! You are the only ones at mafia meeting, so you know other Capo as well.
The Newspaper just come in! One of the Capo üë∑, {0}, was arrested for accomplice to mafia activities.
The Newspaper just come in! {0} was caught on their way to the meeting with the Godfather! They were a Mafia Captain üë∑!
The other Caporegimes at your meeting with the Godfather are {0}
{0} is trying to convert a new prospective member, but they find a police raid was happening on their house...
The polices are trying to raid {0}'s house, but find that the Bouncer and their arsenal are blocking the way. Didn't want to risk a full-blown firefight, the cops retreated.
{0} try to convert {1} to the Church, but they were dismissed as "child's play"!
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.
You deliver some documents to {0}'s house! Your curiosity wins out, and you peek into the envelope. There was a letter from the Head of the Church of Happyology!
was
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that {0} is seen leaving the town hastily last night. You wonder what happened.
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that the city is mounting a search mission for {0}, who has not been seen since last night.
That's strange, {0} misses their meeting with the Godfather last night.
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
left town.
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @werewolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no game running. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Craving for some Mafia action? Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
Time's up!
You are a Pastor (Cupid) üèπ, the witness of an (un)holy matrimony and true love. As wedded spouse, the two before you will not leave one's side, in shame or in jail.

You are an ID Thief (Doppelg√§nger) üé≠. Starting as a simple pickpocket, you realize that you can easily fool the city into tricking that you are the person in any identity card you have. Of course, you can only use the identity when the original is not in town.

You are the Construction Worker (Hunter) üéØ. You look like nothing special, but you know every weakness in every building in the city. The policeman will be incapacitated if they try to raid your trap-laden house. If you're forced to leave the city, someone's house will pay.

You are the Kidnapper (Serial Killer) üî™. Kidnapping people without demanding any ransom, you do this every night just for giggles. Throw a people in your dungeon every night, and perhaps you can open your own museum later!
You wed {0} in the city's Church. You will not leave each other's side, in jail or in shame.
The city elect to exile you! Whose house will you demolish out of retaliation?
{0} was exiled. In their way out of city, you saw them pushing a button, but nothing happens.
{0} was exiled. In their way out of city, you saw them trying to push a button, but it seems that they don't have enough courage to do that.
{0} was exiled. In their way out of city, you saw them pushing a button, and then you heard an explosion! It seems that {1}'s house was reduced to rubble. {1} left the city. {2}
The Paparazzi has written an expos√© on your frauds! Before you leave the city in shame, you have the power to reduce someone's house to ruins. Choose, quick!
The expos√© on {0} was too much, they left the city without any retaliation.
{0} left the city in shame. In their way out of city, you saw them trying to push a button, but it seems that they don't have enough courage to do that.
{0} left the city in shame. In their way out of city, you saw them pushing a button, and then you heard an explosion! It seems that {1}'s house was reduced to rubble. {1} left the city. {2}
{0} went to try to convert {1}, but they haven't been heard since! It's like they are kidnapped and disappear from the face of the earth!
The policemen try to raid the Construction Worker's house, but before he can be arrested, an officer fell into a trap door and has to be hospitalized! {0} is incapacitated.
The policemen try to raid the Construction Worker's house, but an officer fell into a trap door and has to be hospitalized! {0} is incapacitated.
The police raided a house last night, but now {0} hasn't been seen since! It's like they are kidnapped and disappear from the face of the earth!
The Newspaper just come in! On page 8: Mysterious Disappearance of {0}. The Kidnapper takes another one for his collection, {1}
You try to induct {0} to your collection, but on the way you see the Bouncer and his Mobile Arsenal. You hastily retreated for the night.
The Church of Happyology sent {0} to {1}'s house! Unfortunately, when the bell is rung, a trap door swallowed {0}! {0} is missing...
The Church of Happyology sent {0} to {1}'s house! {1} seemed nice enough until they shoved and locked {0} to the freezer room! {0} is missing...
You stand guard in front of the kidnapper's house, but after a sweet smell and a whack, you lose consciousness. You have been kidnapped!
You went to deliver some chemical to {0}'s house, just for him to force a handkerchief soaked in it to your nose! You delivered the goods to the Kidnapper, and now you're deemed missing!
don't worry about this string for now! {0} - {0}
The ID theft shows up to the meeting with the Godfather! {0} is now a Caporegime!
{0} is not in the city anymore! You begin to modify the ID to be received as a Capo. Your fellow Capos (if any) are: {1}
The ID theft shows up to the Church of Happyology meeting! {0} is now a member of the Church!
{0} is not in the city anymore! You begin to modify the ID to be received as a Church Member. Your fellow members (if any) are: {1}
You saw {0} in the morning briefing, acting like a veteran police. It seems that {0} is a new police member!
{0} is not in the city anymore! You begin to modify the ID to be received as a Police Officer. Your fellow police officers (if any) are: {1}
The Newspapers just come in! Fairview open a museum of wax statue of recent citizens! The Kidnapper have won!
Who do you want to add to your collection tonight?
With {0}'s disappearance, it seems that {1} their spouse follows suit. They go together, just like a good couple should be. {2}
Whose identity do you want to pickpocket?
Who did swear eternal love in the Church of Fairview? Choose the first player!
Who did swear eternal love in the Church of Fairview? Choose the last player!
the Construction Worker üéØ
Pastor üèπ
the Kidnapper üî™
the ID Thief üé≠
üíûüíû You swore your eternal love to {0}, for better, for worse, in health and in sickness. If they have to leave the city, you will also follow. üíûüíû
You take the identity of an Idealist üë∂. Your parent is {0}.
True love endures! The lovers have won!
The Newspaper just come in! {0} is lost, their last message said that they were going to the Construction Worker's house! {1}
A member of the Church of Happyology tried to fold you to their midst, but you dismiss them as a silly group.
You are already on the wait list for {0}
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.
A new game is starting in {0}

Morning comes, and the remaining two citizen walk out to the town square. {0} takes a look at {1}, apparently mumbling about how The Thinker's pose will be perfect for them. {0} then drags {1} into the dungeon.
"Hello, {1}. What would you like to be? David? Mona Lisa? Or maybe the Statue of Liberty?" said {0} cheerily. Then it dawns to them: {0} is the Kidnapper, and {1} is the last victim!
The city lost all of its citizen, now even more eerie than the scariest ghost town...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the town square. {0} drags {1} to their dungeon, but {1} managed to demolish it from within. The crumbling sounds is the last sound of the city, nobody wins...
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.

Villager? What do you think we are, some rural hicks? *sips whiskey*\n \nI think you mean Mafia Soldier (Villager) üë±! A simple footsoldier for the Fairview Famiglia, they only take orders from the higher-ups without knowing who they are. Today, they have one mission: doing their best protecting the Godfather from the cops!

Psst! Not so loud! I won't risk my family for you! *inhales cigars*\n \nThe Torture Technician (Seer) üë≥ is one of the most important guy in the Famiglia. Their job is to "extract information" about a citizen's true allegiance, without them knowing, of course. For that reason, they make the most valuable target for the police!

Werewolves? Are you right in your head? *polishes Tommy gun*
 
The Police Officer (Werewolf) üê∫ from F.P.D. is just as feral, though. They vow to get rid of mafia in their "beloved" neighborhood, one scum at a time. Every day, they have to blend in with other mafia and try not to be exiled. Each night, they can choose to arrest someone.
The rumor is, a Repentant Mafia will surrender and join their ranks if the Police raid their house at night.
They still need to watch their steps in front of the Politician. If anything happens to the Politician's spouse, they will guard their funeral the next night and there won't be any chance for a raid.

I wish there's someone that sexy in this city... *whistles*
 
I've got the Middleman (Harlot) üíã for my other fixes! They've got the good stuff and will sell them for a price. Every night, they deliver the contrabands to a citizen. 
I really wish that they don't happen to be visiting a raid target. The police is sure to grab them to the jail with all the illegal stuffs they have. 
Luckily, since the Middleman is always on the road, the Police won't meet them in their house if they're out selling something to someone.

I need a drink too... *orders 3 shots of whiskey* \n \nThe Politician (Drunk) üçª knows his his booze. A politician on mafia's payroll, they keep a high status in Fairview. However corrupt they are, the town will honor them a night of mourning for their or their family's death. Let's hope nothing happens if the police decided to raid them...

Of course nobody is cursed here... *fidgets with a bullet*\n \nBut I've heard someone is a Repentant Mafia (Cursed) üòæ. They have been afraid with their criminal life's consequences, and ready to leave it for good whenever the cops come for you. If the police decided to raid their house, they say they will surrender and join their ranks, able to join the raid every night!

Now don't tell anybody I tell you this... *looks around nervously*\n \nI heard we have a Double Agent (Traitor) üñï in our Famiglia. They lay low to hide their true allegiance, but if their cop friends are dead or missing, they will come out and continue the police's work!

I met an angel once, in that hotel 'round the corner. *sports reminiscing looks*\n \nBut I think you might've heard of the Bouncer (Guardian Angel) üëº already. Every night, they guard a citizen's house. Between their imposing build and a truck full of knives, pistols, machine guns, and every other weapon conceivable (yes, that include a knife-shooting machine gun... long story), the police won't risk a firefight and will abandon the raid if the Bouncer happened to be guarding their target. However, if they choose to guard a cop's house, there's a 50% chance the cop will notice their truck and arrest them!

Detective? You mean the snooping and tiptoeing around kind? *flips a coin*\n \nThe Stalker (Detective) üïµ is our next best thing, kiddo. This creep may be a creep, but they are a creep on our payroll. During the day, they may stalk a player to reveal their true allegiance. But there is a 40% chance the cops will find them stalking around them! Their stalking is one of the most hated activities by cops here, you can be sure this creep has a target on their back.

We all have our guns, don't we? *juggles a few bullets*\n \nThe Paparazzi (Gunner) üî´ is just as mean without a gun, though. Although on the Godfather's payroll, they can't resist a big scoop. They are an expert on exposing dirts on everyone who lives here. The shame they can bring to any citizen... it can be unbearable and will always force the exposed citizen to leave city. The Newspaper only have 2 (two) spots for him though.

Yes, isn't this leather pistol holder neat? *shows their pistol around*\n \nBy the way, watch out for the Suicide Bomber (Tanner) üë∫. When the city gives up on them, they will also give up on the city, and detonate the bomb they planted everywhere. They try their best to make people vote to exile them to reach the greatest reward: a big kaboom!

You know who's the real fool? *glares menacingly*\n \nNot you, but that gossiper! They think they are a great source of info, and goes around town gossiping about anybody. They even acts like our Technician. However, their sources can't really be trusted and they just accuse anybody randomly!

Ah, I know what you are thinking about... *smiles mischievously*
 
As for me, I'm thinking of those Church of Happyology (Cultist) üë§! They say they only want everyone, mafia or not, chill and worship their deity. I say they are embezzling our city's treasury and our Family's wealth.
 
I actually see one of them visiting someone every other night, recruiting everybody they meet to their little club. The city will be surely gone if everybody follow their lead.

That bloke huh? They are on our payroll, too... *squints unexpectedly*\n \nThe local IRS Officer (Cult Hunter) üíÇ is tasked to battle tax embezzlement by the Feds. The godfather informed them that the Church of Happyology are embezzling tax from the City, so the Agent is in good standing with us... for now.

Aren't you THE wild one, asking all this questions? *hums a sweet tune*\n \nYou remind me of the Idealist (Wild Child) üë∂. Always a do-gooder, that kid, never to lose hope on humanity. Even with a scum like me, he tried to make me "mend my ways." Got it from their parents, I suppose. I just hope nothing bad happens to their parent. It's the only thing preventing him to become a police officer, you see.

Ah, the apprentice? Yeah, we got a creepy kid for that. *shudders*\n \nYou know them, the Tech Assistant (Apprentice Seer) üôá. They never "extract information" by yourself, but if the Technician is nowhere to be found, they will be hired to do the "extracting" as well!

We don't say their name out loud here... *continues in whispers*
 
You see, the Consigliere (Beholder) üëÅ is Godfather's right hand man. They employ a "personal advisor" to "extract information". That's the Torture Technician!
 
That Gossip poser? They are beneath the Consigliere notice. Likewise for the Assistant, unless the Torture Technician is indisposable and they need another "information extraction" specialist.

Of course I know them. They are good guys. Great even. *grins*\n \nThey are the Caporegime (Mason) üë∑, a Mafia Captain! They say they are the only ones at mafia meeting, so they know other Caporegime as well. They don't have their own assistants, though.

That little thief. That's my third wallet this week. *growls angrily*
 
I'm talking about the ID Thief (Doppelg√§nger) üé≠. Starting as a simple pickpocket, they realize that they can easily fool the city into tricking that they are the person in any identity card you have. Of course, they can only use the identity when the original is not in town.
Note: If the original ID owner was converted to the Church of Happyology, they will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were the Idealist and their parents disappeared, the Thief will become a police. Otherwise, they will inherit their parents.
The Church of Happyology cannot convert the ID Thief (but can after the Thief switches roles). Also - the ID Thief can NOT win unless they have take over a role. If at the end of the game, the ID Thief is still the same, they lose (exception: lover).

Another do-gooder huh? At least they're on our side. *glances to the direction of the church*
 
The Pastor (Cupid) üèπ is the witness of an (un)holy matrimony and true love. As wedded spouse, the two before them will not leave one's side, in shame or in jail.
 
Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (Mafia + Police), and one team wins (Police), the lover (Mafia) wins as well. TL;DR if both lovers are alive at the end, and at least one of them was on the winning team, they both win together

Oh yeah, my house is built by them. The best contractor in town. *talks normally*
 
They? They are the Construction Worker (Hunter) üéØ. They may look like nothing special, but they know every weakness in every building in the city. The policeman will be incapacitated if they try to raid the Worker's trap-laden house. If they're forced to leave the city, someone's house will pay.
 
Note: For police attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one police, the Construction Worker has a 30% chance to incapacitate the police officer (and survive). For each additional officers, add 20% (2 polices = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple police officers, while the Worker may kill one of them, they will still be outnumbered and arrested. 
If the Church of Happyology tries to convert the Construction Worker, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, the Worker have a 50% chance to trap one of them!

I thought they are only an urban legend... *hunchs instinctively*
 
The Kidnapper (Serial Killer) üî™ is the nightmare of the city. Kidnapping people without demanding any ransom, they do this every night just for giggles. They throw a people in your dungeon every night, and they say perhaps they want to open their own museum later! 
 
They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the Kidnapper, they can kidnap ANYONE - Mafia, Police, Bouncer, Pastor, whatever. If the police raid your home, they will kidnap one of them instead (random), and live.
Para is The Godfather, even above the Fairview's Godfather. It is rumored he collects thousands of fedoras and have worn every single one of them.

You are appointed as the Underboss. The commander under the Godfather himself. If you accept your role as the Underboss, your voice weighted twice as powerful as before.
You are the Child of God...father, secretly trying to live a normal life of a lowly soldier. If the people try to exile you out, the God...father will tell who you are and rescue you from exlie.
You are a Swing Voter. You cant decide who you want to vote, so there's a 50% chance that you choose someone else other than who you intended. Especially if they dont like swing dance.

You are the Informant, the ally of Justice! Working behind the scenes and inside the mafia, you try to find your ally, the Police, or the Torturer Technician. Being the ally of Just ice, you'll only win if the Police win.

You are the Street Whistler, the notification squad. For one time only during the day, you can set up a watchpoint in the town. When the Police conducts a raid in the night, you will sound the alarm to stop the police raid. After that you are just another lowly soldier going about their day.

Salutations to the Police Commisioner, the PC, the Commish. Your order are just and fair. Your charm, will turn even the lowliest soldier of mafia to the police force. As long as you are in the town, every time you raid a person, they have a 20% chance to follow you as a Police officer.

salutations to the Police Commisioner, may your order be just and fair. For as long as you are in the town, your order arE absolute and can turn even the lowliest soldier of mafia to the police force. Every night, you can choose a person to raid, and they have a 20% chance to follow your lead as a Police officer.

The Rookie of the force. As a fresh graduate from the academy, you are both bold and reckless, fierce and loyal at the same time, you'll follow the force to every raid and even to the ends of time. Being the pride of the force, if by chance you are exiled or kidnapped, the police force will be scour the city and conduct two police raid the next night.

The vote has been casted, and from that was decided that {0} was to be exlied. Suddenly a voice was heard from a far, "That is the beloved Child, in whom the God...father are well pleased." Knowing they made a mistake, the people return to their home in hopes to avoid the wrath of the Godfather.
You try to find out who {0} they are, but you only know that they are neither a police nor a torture technician.

{0} steps forward into the center of the masses, reaching into the insde his suit pocket taking out an Underboss signet and wear it on his little finger. Identifying him as the Underboss. From now on, {0}'s vote for exile count as two votes.
Click "Show Off" whenever you want to show your self as the Underboss
Show Off
Would you like to set up a watchpoint to prevent the Police raid tonight?

As the people argue during the day, they noticed {0} erecting some sort of wacthtower in the city perimeter. With the watchtower around, tonight the police will have to find a new route around the watchtower

As the police began raiding {0}, the Police Commisioner, {1}, calls the unit to bring him the suspect. After a lenghty conversation and coersion, {1} tells the force, that they would have assist the Police starting tomorrow night

Your house was raided last night but the Police Commisioner himself try to convince you to join the Police Force. You ask for a day to prepare yourself and promise to help them starting tomorrow night
You have prepared everything and ready to join the Police force, tonight you will wear the shiny badge for the first time. You are now a Police Officer

Well, you cannot tell the Underboss from the soldier, unless they decided to wear the shiny ring with the Family's insignia. Then they will carry out the Godfather voice too when vote to exile people (meaning that their vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's)

As the Son of Godfather, once people decided to exiled them, their cover is revealed and the Mafia will try their best to appease them and the Godfather. They still can stay in the City later unless someone decided to sneak out at night or destroyed their home.

Ah, the Informant is the one guy that always try to find way to quit the Family by providing information of the Torture Technician to the Police. However their files only contain profiles of the Police and Torture Technician.
Well, as they always change their mind in the last minute, the Swing Voter sometimes forget who they supposed to vote and end up with random vote (50% chance to vote for someone random)
